desc: Locally made in Lennox Head, wild yeast fermented and naturally carbonated. The taste is slightly sweet but packed with spicy ginger punch. Great gift idea for teachers, mums and dads. We use re-useable flip top bottles to help you reduce waste. Delivery available from Ballina to Byron. What a unique gift idea!

layout.text: Our Ginger Beer is made from freshly harvested back paddock grown organic ginger! It's low in sugar content and buzzing full of good health! Slightly sweet and wildly spicy!
